metadata.title: CVE-2020-11538 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In libImaging/SgiRleDecode.c in Pillow through 7.0.0, a number of out-of-bounds reads exist in the parsing of SGI image files, a different issue than CVE-2020-5311.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11538` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.2.0-1').
